Projects

Projects

Bug Deduplication
A system that automatically detects duplicate bug reports in OSS projects. Turned into two papers, one [published](http://papersdb.cs.ualberta.ca/~papersdb/view_publication.php?pub_id=1125), one not (yet). No public link for the second one yet.

Work Experience

Darkhorse Analytics — Analyst
Analyst working on statistical projects. Work focuses on coming up with novel methods of forecasting for clients. Heavy Python usage.
Legislative Assembly Office — Policy & Research Analyst
The administrative branch of the Legislative Assembly of Alberta.
University of Alberta — Research Assistant
Under Dr. Christoph Frei's supervision, I worked on modelling the prisoner's dilemma in continuous time, a problem from game theory.
